---
title: Stretch Test
subtitle: Brachial Plexus Special Test
---


# Technique

- Patient is positioned in sitting or standing @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Ask patient to:
    - Raise the ipsilateral arm @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - Then to contraolateral head side bend @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Pt in sitting/standing and asked to raise arm on involved side and then side bend to uninvolved side @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

# Grading

- Positive test: Pain + paresthesia along the involved arm @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - Interpretation: Indicative of a [brachial plexus irritation]({{< var ref-brachial-plexus-irritation.path >}}) @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
